Articles.Content:
So ya, lovin\' KSP

It damn near kills my comp though when I launch my beast, the 'LOLWUT Mk2', 24 liquid engines on the ends in 12 clusters of 2 for initial lift off and then six giant pillars of fuel tanks for a slow burn out, followed by a single engine being fed by 9 tanks for an even longer burn.

And I\'m still having all sorts of fun with the stock parts that were on the free download.

I haven\'t even tried for the Mun yet weeee

Oh and hai Dutvutan/Syrsa, you brought me here with this xD

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Very Kerbalish rockets there!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Welcome to the forums. May you build the biggest rockets, and make the biggest explosions.

Skunky, did you get a promotion? The blue looks neat.
Welcome to the forums. I personally don\'t work with stock but it looks like your having fun. Have fun launching.
